title: FS: T206 Sweet Caporal Frank Smith Chi/Bos Fac 42 Overprint Double PSA 4
author: gregstarling

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Sweet Caporal Frank Smith Chi/Bos Fac 42 Overprint Double PSA 4
posts.post_content:
If I can't make a sale today, I'm just going to push it up to the bay as an auction. So if no one bites, you can pick it up there.

Pretty firm on $500 (have already turned down $300)

T206 Sweet Caporal Frank Smith Chicago / Boston
Series 350-460 Factory 42 Overprint (Factory 30 Showing)
PSA 4 that displays very well

Scanner was a bit fuzzy so in addition to scanner pics also added actual camera photos that give a better feel for the actual crispness of the text and colors.

[IMG]http://thecoordinator.com/ebay/FrankFront.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://thecoordinator.com/ebay/FrankBack.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://thecoordinator.com/ebay/FrankStandUpBack.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://thecoordinator.com/ebay/FrankStandUpFront.jpg[/IMG]
Well, I turned down a $400+ offer and put it on eBay. I'll probably be kicking myself in 7 days.
